name: Kristina Safarova
what_you_do: Strategy consulting firm offering coaching, mentoring, and training programs for aspiring and current consultants and executives.
who_you_serve: Aspiring consultants, executives, and professionals seeking careers at top consulting firms or building their own consulting practices.
social_proof: Amazon best-seller (The Strategy Journal), ex-McKinsey partner network
signature_programs: Consulting Sales Rainmaker Program, The MasterPlan Acceleration Program, Executive Presence & Communication Coaching Program, The Authority Based Business Mentoring & Coaching Program, EB-1A Green Card: An Alien of Extraordinary Ability, Speak Without Limits, The Andrew Program, Published Author Program, Strategy Studies, Titans of Strategy, Innovating an Industrial Giant
business_focus: Helping professionals break into top consulting firms and build successful consulting practices through coaching, training, and strategy content.
service_provided: Career coaching, case interview preparation, consulting sales training, executive presence coaching, published author program, strategy training videos, mentoring programs, EB-1A green card guidance
